definition: avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
to have a voracious desire for/to covet/greedy/corrupt
heart/mind/intention/center/core/CL:顆|颗[ke1],個|个[ge4]
(negative prefix)/not/no
excessive
foot/to be sufficient/ample

sentences.english: Greedy and dissatisfied person who like a snake tries to swallow an elephant.
sentences.chinese: 帮帮我啊贪心不足蛇吞象翻译英语是什么？

sentences.english: A man whose heart is not content is like a snake which tries to swallow an elephant.
sentences.chinese: 比喻人贪心不足，就像蛇想吞食大象一样。

sentences.english: The greedy boss stopped at nothing to gain profit.
sentences.chinese: 贪心不足的老板为获取利润而无所不为。

definition: avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
a man who is never content is like a snake trying to swallow an elephant (idiom)
pinyin: ren2 xin1 bu4 zu2 she2 tun1 xiang4

definition: greedy
lit. covet Sichuan once Gansu has been seized/fig. endless greed/insatiable desire
bottomless pit of desire (idiom); insatiable greed/carnal cravings are never satisfied and are a main obstruction on the path to enlightenment
mad about money (idiom)
to lose one's head through material greed (idiom)
to be greedy in getting money
avaricious and insatiable (idiom); greedy and never satisfied
not knowing when to come or leave (idiom); with no sense of propriety
unable to differentiate good from bad (idiom)/not to know what's good for one/unable to recognize others' good intentions
to open one's eyes wide at the sight of profit (idiom); thinking of nothing but personal gain/money-grubbing
to be shortsighted
blinded by greed (idiom)
unable to tell good from bad (idiom)/undiscriminating
greedy for sex/given to lust for women
